item.description: We usually have about 20 to 25 people at practice, and it's a pretty good workout.  We practice Thursdays at 6pm and Saturdays at 9am.  Practice runs for 2 hours.  We meet at the docks behind Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital (125 Nashua St., Boston).  There's parking available for $5.  The place is also T accessible.  The closest stops are Science Park, Charles/MGH, or North Station.  If you want, we can lock up anything you don't want to bring with you on the boat.  Wear gym clothes or something you normally work out in.  There are places to get changed at Spaulding (oh, and there's a Dunkin Donuts, too---I find Saturday mornings a bit rough sometimes).  And footwear:  wear something like sandals, flip-flops, Tevas, Crocs, or you can just paddle barefoot.  We don't go swimming or anything, but paddling kicks up some spray.
item.how_to_find_us: We meet at the docks behind Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital. We'll be the people wearing life jackets and holding paddles
item.why: Paddling on the Charles is fun, good upper-body cross training, a great way to meet people, and it's fun...oh wait, I said that already.
item.name: Dragon Boat Practice Session
